name: Waldhexe
description:
(This game is playable beginning to end, and is very rough around the edges)

(If the game starts in the unreal engine editor, click the play button at the top right.) 

SPACE--JUMP

CTRL--CROUCH (NO Animation)

E--INTERACT

This project was originally created for a games design course, and because it was my first time creating a game, it's fairly barebones.

I'm uploading this project a year after I stopped development, so I don't remember all of the artists assets I used for the project. I apologise that I can't appropriately credit all of the artists who I used the assets of.
